snippet: Burnley have again broken their transfer record, to sign Ireland midfielder Jeff Hendrick from second-tier Derby County on a three-year contract, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Burnley Sign Hendrick From Derby for Another Club-Record Fee
headline.print_headline: Burnley Sign Hendrick From Derby for Another Club-Record Fee

lead_paragraph: Burnley have again broken their transfer record, to sign Ireland midfielder Jeff Hendrick from second-tier Derby County on a three-year contract, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.

snippet: Manchester United midfielder Marouane Fellaini and Leicester City defender Robert Huth have been banned for three matches by the Football Association (FA) for their violent conduct during Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw....

headline.main: Fellaini and Huth Handed Three-Match Suspension
headline.print_headline: Fellaini and Huth Handed Three-Match Suspension

lead_paragraph: Manchester United midfielder Marouane Fellaini and Leicester City defender Robert Huth have been banned for three matches by the Football Association (FA) for their violent conduct during Sunday's 1-1 Premier League draw.

snippet: Sunderland central defender Lamine Kone has signed a new five-year contract that will keep the Ivory Coast international at the Stadium of Light until 2021, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Sunderland's Kone Signs New Five-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Sunderland's Kone Signs New Five-Year Deal

lead_paragraph: Sunderland central defender Lamine Kone has signed a new five-year contract that will keep the Ivory Coast international at the Stadium of Light until 2021, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane has been backed to rediscover his scoring touch by manager Mauricio Pochettino ahead of Wednesday's Premier League visit to Southampton....

headline.main: Pochettino Not Worried by Kane Drought Ahead of Saints Trip

snippet: Crystal Palace striker Connor Wickham is facing a three-match ban after being charged with violent conduct by the FA for allegedly elbowing Tottenham Hotspur defender Jan Vertonghen in the face in an incident missed by referee Martin Atkinson on S...

headline.main: Wickham Charged With Violent Conduct After Elbow on Vertonghen
headline.print_headline: Wickham Charged With Violent Conduct After Elbow on Vertonghen

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace striker Connor Wickham is facing a three-match ban after being charged with violent conduct by the FA for allegedly elbowing Tottenham Hotspur defender Jan Vertonghen in the face in an incident missed by referee Martin Atkinson on Saturday.

snippet: Leicester City will not be signing any more players in the January transfer window as they bid to secure a top-four finish in the Premier League, manager Claudio Ranieri said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Leicester's January Transfer Business Is Done, Says Ranieri
headline.print_headline: Leicester's January Transfer Business Is Done, Says Ranieri

lead_paragraph: Leicester City will not be signing any more players in the January transfer window as they bid to secure a top-four finish in the Premier League, manager Claudio Ranieri said on Tuesday.

snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has spoken with his players in a bid to find the reasons behind their run of five games without a win but said he is no stranger to such swings of momentum during a season....

headline.main: Winless Run Just Part of Football, Says Guardiola
headline.print_headline: Winless Run Just Part of Football, Says Guardiola

lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has spoken with his players in a bid to find the reasons behind their run of five games without a win but said he is no stranger to such swings of momentum during a season.

snippet: Arsenal goalkeeper Petr Cech was voted Czech Republic player of the year for 2015, the former Chelsea stopper picking up the award for a record eight time....

headline.main: Cech Wins Czech Player of the Year for Record Eighth Time
headline.print_headline: Cech Wins Czech Player of the Year for Record Eighth Time

lead_paragraph: Arsenal goalkeeper Petr Cech was voted Czech Republic player of the year for 2015, the former Chelsea stopper picking up the award for a record eight time.

snippet: Leicester City will play Barcelona, Celtic and Paris St Germain in this year's International Champions Cup (ICC), the Premier League leaders said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Leicester to Face Barca, PSG in Champions Cup
headline.print_headline: Leicester to Face Barca, PSG in Champions Cup

lead_paragraph: Leicester City will play Barcelona, Celtic and Paris St Germain in this year's International Champions Cup (ICC), the Premier League leaders said on Tuesday.

snippet: Chelsea manager Antonio Conte hailed the tactical flexibility of Victor Moses in Saturday's 2-0 Premier League victory at Hull City, saying the 25-year-old would fit the wing-back role....

headline.main: Chelsea's Conte Praises Moses' Impact as Wing-Back
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Conte Praises Moses' Impact as Wing-Back

lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Antonio Conte hailed the tactical flexibility of Victor Moses in Saturday's 2-0 Premier League victory at Hull City, saying the 25-year-old would fit the wing-back role.
